rows.label: qst106001_0010
rows.name:
Dad, what's wrong, meh?
Does your tummy hurt, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0020
rows.name:
Hmm?
...Ah, it's Tora, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0030
rows.name: My stomach isn't upset or anything, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0040
rows.name:
Masterpon always has good meals, good sleep,
and good bowel movements, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0050
rows.name: Yes, yes, I'm in excellent health, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0060
rows.name:
That information is completely unnecessary, meh.
...So, what were you mumbling about, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0070
rows.name: Ah, well... Thing is...

rows.label: qst106001_0080
rows.name: I was thinking about a new mode for Hana, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0090
rows.name:
Oh!
Tora and Dadapon have same idea!

rows.label: qst106001_0100
rows.name:
Actually, Tora was also thinking about
powering up Hana soon, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0110
rows.name: What? Tora think that too?

rows.label: qst106001_0120
rows.name: As expected of my son, we think alike, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0130
rows.name: So, what kind of mode was Dad thinking about, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0140
rows.name:
Are you curious, meh?
Can't be helped, meh. I'll specially show you, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0150
rows.name: This is Hana's final mode, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0160
rows.name: W-what's this?!

rows.label: qst106001_0170
rows.name:
What do you think, meh?
Are you speechless from how amazing it is, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0180
rows.name: This mode called 'Super Fighter Mode'!

rows.label: qst106001_0190
rows.name:
This Hana size of ten Rosas.
More battle power than Divine Beast warship.

rows.label: qst106001_0200
rows.name: What Dadapon thinking?!

rows.label: qst106001_0210
rows.name:
Dadapon just take old Hana blueprint
and enlarge!

rows.label: qst106001_0220
rows.name: Dadapon thinking just like Bahn...

rows.label: qst106001_0230
rows.name: What, does Tora dislike big things, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0240
rows.name: Then how about this, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0250
rows.name:
Uh? Hmmm...
Too small for Tora's eyesight...

rows.label: qst106001_0260
rows.name:
This is Hana compacted down 
to an extremely small size, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0270
rows.name:
What do you mean 'extremely small size', meh?
Isn't this just a reduced copy of the blueprint, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0280
rows.name:
First of all, if it's this small,
it won't be of any use, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0290
rows.name:
No, no, if it's the size of an ant,
it could infiltrate any place.

rows.label: qst106001_0300
rows.name:
And its power is the same as before.
This is truly an anâ€”

rows.label: qst106001_0310
rows.name:
Dad... Let's stop here because going 
further would be problematic in various ways, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0320
rows.name:
Hmm...
This is no good either, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0330
rows.name: Just what kind of thing does Tora prefer, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0340
rows.name:
Want to know, meh?
Want to know, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0350
rows.name: Can't be helped. I'll tell you, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0360
rows.name:
What Tora is thinking of is...
I call it JD Mode.

rows.label: qst106001_0370
rows.name: Jay-dee mode?

rows.label: qst106001_0380
rows.name: That's right, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0390
rows.name:
This time, Hana will aim to be
an even more adult and mature woman, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0400
rows.name: Tora and Hana grow up together!

rows.label: qst106001_0410
rows.name:
Hmm...
I don't know what JD stands for, but...

rows.label: qst106001_0420
rows.name:
But Tora's extraordinary enthusiasm
is definitely coming across, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0430
rows.name: Dadapon! Dadapon like it!

rows.label: qst106001_0440
rows.name:
Ah, I understand, meh.
My son.

rows.label: qst106001_0450
rows.name:
Very well! Dadapon will get right to it!
Kiku! Ready my things!

rows.label: qst106001_0460
rows.name: Yes, Masterpon! At once.

rows.label: qst106001_0470
rows.name: Listen up, Hana.

rows.label: qst106001_0480
rows.name:
Tora and Dad will be
holed up 
in the back room for a while.

rows.label: qst106001_0490
rows.name:
Don't let anyone disturb very very very important work!
Got it?

rows.label: qst106001_0500
rows.name: Yes, Masterpon!

rows.label: qst106001_0510
rows.name: What is Tora planning to start?

rows.label: qst106001_0520
rows.name: Who knows...

rows.label: qst106001_0530
rows.name: I heard something about powering up Hana-chan.

rows.label: qst106001_0540
rows.name:
Something about being adult and mature, 
like saying "my head pain hurts."

rows.label: qst106001_0550
rows.name: You're not one to talk about others.

rows.label: qst106001_0560
rows.name: Huh? Why?

rows.label: qst106001_0570
rows.name: Wow, this guy doesn't even realize.

rows.label: qst106001_0580
rows.name:
If it's about powering up,
does that mean they're going to modify Hana?

rows.label: qst106001_0590
rows.name: Guess so.

rows.label: qst106001_0600
rows.name:
But from the looks of it,
they probably won't come out for a while.

rows.label: qst106001_0610
rows.name:
Can't be helped. 
Let's go back to the inn and take a rest.

rows.label: qst106001_0620
rows.name:
Huh?
They're still at it?

rows.label: qst106001_0630
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: qst106001_0640
rows.name:
They've been going nonstop since yesterday,
without eating a single meal or getting any sleep.

rows.label: qst106001_0650
rows.name: Tora... He doesn't know what's good for him, sometimes.

rows.label: qst106001_0660
rows.name:
If they don't moderate themselves, 
they're going to collapse.

rows.label: qst106001_0670
rows.name: Urk!

rows.label: qst106001_0680
rows.name: My lady!

rows.label: qst106001_0690
rows.name:
It's done!
Finally completed!

rows.label: qst106001_0700
rows.name:
"Completed"...?
Tora, just what did you complete?

rows.label: qst106001_0710
rows.name: Meh-he-he-he...

rows.label: qst106001_0720
rows.name:
Behold!
Really something, huh?

rows.label: qst106001_0730
rows.name: Ooh!

rows.label: qst106001_0740
rows.name:
This is!
Hana's final form, meh!

rows.label: qst106001_0750
rows.name: M-my lady, get a hold of yourself!

rows.label: qst106001_0760
rows.name: ...gyagh...

rows.label: qst106001_0770
rows.name:
T-Tora,
Is this really okay?

rows.label: qst106001_0780
rows.name:
That might be a bit too adult
and too early for children.

rows.label: qst106001_0790
rows.name: Tora not care!

rows.label: qst106001_0800
rows.name:
Tora has made the decision
to climb the stairs to adulthood, meh.

rows.label: qst106001_0810
rows.name:
I see... You're so determined
to do this, meh?

rows.label: qst106001_0820
rows.name: Dadapon. Tora mean what he say.

rows.label: qst106001_0830
rows.name: A real grown man stakes his life on his dreams!

rows.label: qst106001_0840
rows.name: Well said, my son.

rows.label: qst106001_0850
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] AD LIB unease

rows.label: qst106001_0860
rows.name: Urgh...

rows.label: qst106001_0870
rows.name: Enough already... Get out of the way!!

rows.label: qst106001_0880
rows.name: Meh-mehh!
